description: A basic iOS Swift application template integrating with the AgentforceSDK for service agents. This template demonstrates how to build mobile apps that leverage Salesforce's AI-powered agent capabilities for customer service scenarios.

useCase.primary: iOS app with Agentforce AI agent integration
useCase.when: Use this template when you need to create an iOS app that integrates with Salesforce Agentforce for AI-powered service agent capabilities.

extensionPoints.name: Agent Configuration
extensionPoints.description: Configure the Agentforce agent settings and credentials
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Update CredentialProvider.swift with your Agentforce credentials Modify Settings.swift for custom configuration options

extensionPoints.name: UI Theming
extensionPoints.description: Customize the visual appearance and theming
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Modify CustomThemeManager.swift to customize colors and styling Update AgentforceMainView.swift for layout changes

templateVariables.name: projectName
templateVariables.description: The name of the iOS project

templateVariables.name: agentId
templateVariables.description: Agentforce Agent ID - the unique identifier for your Agentforce agent

templateVariables.name: esDeveloperName
templateVariables.description: Einstein Studio Developer Name for your Agentforce deployment
